text: Lajos Varga (23 November 1933 - 7 February 2006) was a Hungarian gymnast. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Hungarian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Hungary Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Békés County
title: Lajos Varga
